page.title: 04STEWARTON ACADEMY
page.content: Secondary pupils in Stewarton moved into the new Academy,a two-storeyed building in the Robertland area on 5th June,1985.Mr Alan Barker, the headteacher and his 65 staff now teach the 824 pupils from 1st to 6th Year in a modern,comfortable building instead of the old building with its many huts.Each group of subjects has the rooms decorated with the same paint and carpets.Among the facilities are an ample library,a lecture theatre a gymnasium and a large games hall.The home economics,business studies,art,computer studies,science and technical departments are very well equipped.Excellent meals and snacks are provided in the dining hall/cafeteria for the majority of the pupils.
